text:
Join us tomorrow, April 2nd, at 6 a.m. PT for a closer look at #NintendoSwitch2! The #NintendoDirect: Nintendo Switch 2 – 4.2.2025 livestream will be approximately 60 minutes long.

Watch it here: https://youtube.com/live/DXUmjX7DsP8…

So what do we all think the “One Last Thing” of this Direct will be?

I’m guessing Smash 6. Sakurai’s next game has been in development for a while, as of this month it’ll be in development for as long as Ultimate was. Releasing later this year doesn’t seem too far-fetched imo

If I were to guess something on tomorrow's Nintendo Direct, it would be that the "mysterious" "C" button on the Nintendo Switch 2 is for something like a Nintendo Switch compatibility mode...
I'm just guessing... It's okay.

Please have a 120hz screen, PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE!!!
I want to play Mario at 120fps!
What are the chances you all show us you actually listen to legit complaints and feedback? Are you going to take those criticisms and make sure the Switch 2 gets it right?
NaN

Will it have a disc drive to play wiiu games? NO. What joy con drift fixed? No. Will 60 fps be standard like on the gamecube ? No. Is there any benefits of this model over using my gaming computer to emulate switch game i own? Heck no. So why would I want a switch 2?

Considering the $400-600 price range of a switch. I could get a steam deck or a custom low range pc with far better specs using used parts. In no way does the switch 2 feel justified given the price and anti customer the console is.
